issue.title: [C++][Documentation] List hash aggregate kernels somewhere
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13311](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13311). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Hash aggregate kernels are not listed in compute.rst with the rest of the functions, presumably because they're not intended to be directly callable. However, once ARROW-12759 goes in, we should find some place to list what aggregations are supported with group by.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13311?focusedCommentId=17401787) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10887
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10887>
